html:
4.11.20  4:51 am   How are you surviving in this quarentine?

     making some long overdue developments and adjustments in the video department

4.11.20  4:40 am   Have you ever just. Idunno. Done stuff.

     yes

      Like.... Riding a bike.... Or a hippo... Or eating pie... 

     usually not those things, but other things for sure

4.11.20  4:11 am   Algebraically speaking, which big band pioneer would you say made the biggest impact on 80s funk?

     buddy rich band

4.11.20  3:43 am   i don't have an instrument so the songs i make end up sounding robotic and passionless. do you have a solution for this?

     i would think, without any instruments, silent is what they would sound

4.11.20  3:32 am   does it get easier to make music if you believe in something?

     yes, but it also is convenient if you believe you believe in something but are not sure. of, if you think you don't believe in anything, but you wish you believed in something. those are all perfectly good combinations

4.11.20  3:10 am   how big are your toes

     smaller than my feet, i'll put it that way

4.11.20  2:12 am   what is earth

      must be some kinda life factory

4.11.20  1:54 am   12.9.19 4:59 pm    4.9.20 12:08 pm    I think I've figured out a way to loop videos on Chrome so you can have your vine page on this site. Ctrl + click (Mac) or right-click (Windows) the video and a menu should pop up. Select "Loop," and the video will start from the beginning once it reaches its end. Will you take my advice and start working on that vine page?

     i don't use chrome and a lot of people don't, so i will need a solution that works everywhere, BUT first things first you need to prove that it's a good loop. Try it on this one, and if you can make a phone recording of it looping and send it to me, i can see if it loops or if there is an egrigious gap

4.11.20  1:53 am   How are you doing releasing your inner demons?

     pretty good, i have a list with 2 coloumns, showing demons released and demons yet to be released

     Finding freedom?

     yes, and sometimes nemo

4.11.20  1:51 am   have you estimated how many more content you can make in your lifetime

     i could but i probably would never estimate it right

4.11.20  1:29 am   do you ever experiment or try making chiptune music

     by the time it gets named, then it might be too late. but the good news is, music in general will never get named. so we're all still safe in that regard

4.11.20  1:27 am   When did the world begin?

     just getting ready now

4.11.20  1:26 am   Have you ever ate a frog then threw it up and was like ouch that hurt a lot like a lot a lot?

     no

4.11.20  12:50 am   I really have to thank you Bill. I know you're likely going to answer this with some sort of "holy fishpaste the magnitude of friendliness is overwhelming" and that's great I really like those answers and how they're always different but I hope you do read this and understand the sincerity of my thanks. I have always felt like there was this slight pretentiousness living inside me about the music that I like. Like if it didn't have extended harmony or weird changes or complicated rhythms it was stupid, but only SOMEWHAT. And I never really liked this about myself but it always felt true and I had a hard time liking other, lets just say more popular sounding music. But listening to your music has made a huge change within me. Like I would never have been into a song like New Canaan even a year ago but now here I am hearing the music and enjoying it and experiencing it like how music should be experienced! And I just feel so much more open to the worl d when i t comes to writing my songs and all the opportunities that are out there. I think I'm really just enjoying music the most I ever have right now, and I owe it all to you. It definitely has an impact on how I view the world as well. Everything seems better. So thank you Bill!!!

     well the,

4.11.20  12:49 am   Just, a question. The whole page is full of them.

Your.. Music. It's very interesting, rather I would say. What goes through your mind other than random words put together?

     music, but the words aren't random. especially when connected with the music

     Is there some sort of, brainstorm?

     yes

     Or some sort of genesis to the idea?

     yes

     I like the music anyways. Good Groove. I play them everyday in my room to help me do the daily tasks I need to do.

Just- one more question.

How can you define your own music?

     the best and only true way to do that, is by making (doing) the music

     Really think about it, Bill. Thanks.

4.11.20  12:48 am   but what if life isnt possible? what if life is a lie?

     then you'll have some explaining to do

4.11.20  12:12 am   Thoughts on fish?

      unbelievable; swimtastic,

4.10.20  11:47 pm   Would you describe your music as intense?

     you may be thinking of it backwards. what i do is use music to describe other things that are intense

4.10.20  10:56 pm   How would you define quality?  

     hard, soft, wavy,

     There's usually a unique interpretation of something among everybody, but there are some things that can be interpreted in different ways.

4.10.20  10:54 pm   Hey, Bill! Do you know any good songs about friendship?

     yes

      My friend's birthday is coming up and I want to sing her a song to make her feel appreciated but I honestly can't think of anything other than love songs, send help ok thx bai

     'peter mayer' good to have a friend

4.10.20  9:30 pm   What is soup

     it's like a plate

4.10.20  9:26 pm   Does the date display when the question was asked or when you answered it?

     asked

4.10.20  9:08 pm   bill, you are my favorite bill and i'm glad you exist. Good music (or music i like) makes me cry if it's not immediately happy and has a good melody. You make me cry but in a very good way, thank you

     holy randelmyer-jobsom, you have taken a friendly angle on this

4.10.20  9:06 pm   if you were stuck on a deserted island, what types of cheeses would you miss most?

     city cheese

4.10.20  7:56 pm   Who do you think you are?

     i've launched an investigation

     Also, your Work is amazing and please don't rush anything because of the people asking for new vids. You make my day, on many days

     holy smokes you are very forthcoming

4.10.20  7:30 pm   What is music theory?

     anyone's guess

4.10.20  7:27 pm   Was any of your videos based on a dream

     yes

4.10.20  6:37 pm   thoughts on anything?

     never heard of it

4.10.20  6:10 pm   What's your favourite name for a donkey

     monkey

4.10.20  5:41 pm   is the 1 train going uptown

     yes, at a very slow pace

4.10.20  4:38 pm   is water wet or is it dry

     moist

4.10.20  4:10 pm   what do you think about pigeons?

     for every pigeon there are at least 2 other pigeons

4.10.20  3:59 pm   what genre would you say your music is

     regular

4.10.20  3:35 pm   i heard that you were working on some type of project

     yes but i have been working on it for at least 15 years so surely you must know it very well by now

4.10.20  3:29 pm   I am very ambitious with my personal projects and I cannot finish them when I want, any advice?

     ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

4.10.20  3:23 pm   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zik6LDFyoIQ In this video at the part from 1:36-1:43, is it true that the guitar player does something really unconventional and cool after Stevie finishes saying "elements of style"? I swear something crazy is going on here but am not informed enough to know if that is the case

      if it's crazy to you then it's crazy. craziness lives in all of us

4.10.20  2:49 pm   are u secretly a goat

     i either don't know or can't tell you

4.10.20  2:48 pm   Should we teleport bread?

     yes

4.10.20  2:33 pm   Do you think pursuing music as a career is a good idea? 

     if it were me, i would pursue it way more than that

4.10.20  2:25 pm   What will you do after answering this question? 

     answer another question

4.10.20  2:06 pm   what is your favorite type of toast?

     roast toast

4.10.20  1:53 pm   If a child somehow survived and grew up in the wilderness without any human contact, how "human" would they be without the influence of society and culture?

     "somewhat"

4.10.20  1:50 pm   really interesting conversation starting about this stack voicing/dense chord topic. okay so here's a voicing that I personally think sounds quite alright when stacked on top up an octave (keep in mind needs to be played in the mid/upper range of the keyboard). the voicing is A-B-D-F#. what different notes would you add to reinforce this boy here?

     you didn't tell me exactly what octave that's in. every octave is completely different, if you're talking about chords (multi-note)

4.10.20  1:49 pm   As a  musician do you make music randomly with things that aren't instruments?

     news flash, everything is instruments

4.10.20  1:28 pm   Tell me a paradox 

     there is no such thing as a paradox

4.10.20  1:00 pm   is it possible to do a thing not bad nor good?

     yes

4.10.20  12:25 pm   I love your style in music & design, how did you come up with it?

     just trying to get by

4.10.20  12:17 pm   How do I become a penguin?

     first you wanna check to see if you already are a penguin, so you don't accidentally become double penguin

4.10.20  12:13 pm   What's the track/song you've most recently listened to?

     the title line of 'you can go your own way' by fleetwood mac

4.10.20  11:38 am   can cancer be cured?

     yes
